Posts.EditableText: For some reason I can't update my date of birth (which is necessary so I can access a particular game). It says "Profile updated successfully." but when I refresh it's no longer there and I still can't access the game. What's going on?
Posts.HTML: For some reason I can't update my date of birth (which is necessary so I can access a particular game). It says "Profile updated successfully." but when I refresh it's no longer there and I still can't access the game. What's going on?

Posts.EditableText: Try making the change, logging out, and then logging in again. Not ideal, but it worked for me!
Posts.HTML: Try making the change, logging out, and then logging in again. Not ideal, but it worked for me!
